00002 
00003 #include <sstream>
00004 
00005 using namespace std;

00007 static const size_t MAX_QUEUE_SIZE = 50;
00008 
00009 void SubmissionInfoCollection::addInfo(const SubmissionInfo& info)
00010 {
00011     if (m_Infos.size() == MAX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00012     {
00013         m_Infos.pop_front();
00014     }
00015     m_Infos.push_back(info);
00016 }
00017 
00018 void SubmissionInfoCollection::clear()
00019 {
00020     m_Infos.clear();
00021 }
00022 
00023 string SubmissionInfoCollection::getPostData() const
00024 {
00025     stringstream ss;
00026     for (std::vector<SubmissionInfo>::size_type i = 0; i < m_Infos.size(); ++i)
00027     {
00028         ss << m_Infos[i].getPostData(static_cast<int>(i));
00029     }
00030 
00031     return ss.str();
00032 }
